text: The Cuba national futsal team represents Cuba in international futsal. They have qualified for the FIFA Futsal World Cup six times and the CONCACAF Futsal Championship. ==Tournaments== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA Futsal World Cup record Year Round 1989 Did not enter 1992 1996 Group stage 3 0 0 3 4 31 2000 3 0 0 3 1 20 2004 3 0 0 3 3 16 2008 4 1 0 3 16 25 2012 Did not qualify 2016 Group stage 3 0 0 3 7 22 2021 Did not qualify 2024 Qualified Totals 6/10 16 1 0 15 31 114 * ===CONCACAF Futsal Championship=== * 1996 - 2nd place * 2000 - 2nd place * 2004 - 2nd place * 2008 - 2nd place * 2012 - Group Stage (5th place) * 2016 - Semi-Final (4th place) * 2021 - Group Stage (12th place) * 2024 - 2nd place ===Futsal at the Pan American Games=== * 2007 â€“ 6th place == References == Category:National futsal teams Category:National sports teams of Cuba
title: Cuba national futsal team
